Text:
the game doesn't start ._.
i copies it to my external hard drive , and when i load it from the XMB , it brings back the XMB .

i tried running it from the internal drive.
same problem.
same problem
tried replacing eboot but still not working
For those who can't start this title. Try to create ASSASSIN_ISO directory under PS3_GAME\USRDIR. Empty is enough. Should help.
is this only spanish ?
okay this works 100% just create ASSASSIN_ISO folder in PS3_GAME/USRDIR and rename the folder BLES00669 then just transfer it via ftp to ps3 hdd/GAMEZ folder. It is also multi english included

YUP the ASSASSIN_ISO triick works great!

The game asks me to update, shall i do it or will it ruin the game?

OK, help me out here. So I create the ASSASSIN_ISO folder. Put it in the PS3_GAME/USRDIR on the internal HDD and rename the folder that contains the game BLES00669 and place that in the ASSASSIN_ISO folder. So it looks like this: PS3_GAME/USRDIR/ASSASSIN_ISO/BLES00669? And can I do this on external HDD? Thank you;)

@stealthpancho

No not like that. The entire folder you downloaded will be renamed to BLES00669. And the structure will be like this. BLES00669/PS3_GAME/USRDIR/ASSASSIN_ISO. You only need to add the empty folder ASSASSIN_ISO to USRDIR and not touch anything alse and it will work
Thank you eni_ndreu. ill try that today:)
It worked! lol! Thank you all!
Thanks! It works with the ASSASSINS_ISO trick!
